text: Pallavi Sharda (born 5 March 1988) is an Australian-Indian actress. She won Miss India Australia in 2010 at the age of 23 which launched her film career. She has worked in Hindi movies like My Name Is Khan, Dus Tola, Besharam, Hawaizaada and Begum Jaan. In 2016, she starred as Prama in the 2016 movie Lion. Sharda was born in Perth, but was raised in Melbourne. She later moved to Mumbai for her Bollywood career. ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian television actors Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Actors from Perth, Western Australia Category:Actors from Melbourne Category:Actors from Mumbai
title: Pallavi Sharda
